markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Practice Makes Perfect](/Spells.aspx?ID=2417)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 271, [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 65

**Domain**
[Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=122)

<row gap="medium">

 

**Trigger** You or an ally within range fails a skill check for a skill in which you or they are trained.

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** the triggering creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The target gains a +2 status bonus to the triggering check, or a +3 bonus if the target has master or better proficiency in the skill. This bonus can change the outcome of the target’s skill check.
name: Practice Makes Perfect
